Slayer skill commands

## /slayer autoslay

**Usage**

- `/slayer autoslay [mode:<string>] [save:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `mode` | `string` | No | Which autoslay mode do you want? | - |
| `save` | `boolean` | No | Save your choice as default | - |

## /slayer new_task

**Usage**

- `/slayer new_task [master:<string>] [save:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `master` | `string` | No | Which Slayer master do you want a task from? | - |
| `save` | `boolean` | No | Save your choice as default | - |

## /slayer manage

**Usage**

- `/slayer manage command:<string> [new:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `command` | `string` | Yes | Skip your current task | - |
| `new` | `boolean` | No | Get a new task (if applicable) | - |

## /slayer rewards buy

**Usage**

- `/slayer rewards buy item:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `item` | `string` | Yes | Item to purchase | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity to purchase, if applicable. | - |
